title: What I’m doing now
text:
What I’m doing now

🇯🇵 Learning Japanese.
🗾 Planning a trip to Japan.
🪓 Playing Valheim.
✅ Designing a great task management system for Apple reminder.
🧠 Incorporating AI coding agent into my daily work using Cursor.
🃏 Competing in Flesh and Blood tournaments.



What I did before

🌐 Setting up this website using Quarto and GitHub Pages.

title: Felix MIL
text:
Github
  
  
    
     LinkedIn
  
  
      Bluesky
  

  
  
👋 Hi, I’m Felix.
👨‍💻 I’m a R developer working at ESQlabs to support the Open Systems Pharmacology initiative and enable a more open source and ethical pharmaceutical and other life-sciences applications.
🔍 I’m interested in many topics, both in professional and personal life. Check out my now page to see what I’m currently focused on.
📝 I occasionally share my thoughts and insights through blog posts on a variety of fascinating topics ranging from data science to personal interests.
